pli-tv-pvr2.1:143.8.eng: Of the six kinds of originations of offenses, it originates in four ways:

pli-tv-pvr2.1:143.9.pli: siyā vācato samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.1:143.9.eng: from speech, not from body or mind; or

pli-tv-pvr2.1:143.10.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.1:143.10.eng: from body and speech, not from mind; or

pli-tv-pvr2.1:143.11.pli: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr2.1:143.11.eng: from speech and mind, not from body; or

pli-tv-pvr2.1:143.12.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….

pli-tv-pvr2.1:144.1.pli: Pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:144.1.eng: “There is an offense entailing confession for giving the full admission to a trainee nun after a given consent has expired. Where was it laid down?”

pli-tv-pvr2.1:144.6.pli: Thullanandā bhikkhunī pārivāsikachandadānena sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:144.6.eng: The nun Thullanandā giving the full admission to a trainee nun after the given consent had expired.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:144.8.eng: Of the six kinds of originations of offenses, it originates in three ways: …

pli-tv-pvr2.1:145.1.eng: “There is an offense entailing confession for giving full admission every year. Where was it laid down?”

pli-tv-pvr2.1:145.6.pli: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo anuvassaṃ vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:145.6.eng: A number of nuns giving full admission every year.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:145.8.eng: Of the six kinds of originations of offenses, it originates in three ways: …

pli-tv-pvr2.1:146.1.pli: Ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:146.1.eng: “There is an offense entailing confession for giving the full admission to two women in the same year. Where was it laid down?”

pli-tv-pvr2.1:146.6.pli: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ekaṃ vassaṃ dve vuṭṭhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:146.6.eng: A number of nuns giving the full admission to two women in the same year.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:146.8.eng: Of the six kinds of originations of offenses, it originates in three ways: …

pli-tv-pvr2.1:147.1.eng: The eighth subchapter on unmarried women is finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:148.4.eng: The nuns from the group of six.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:154.1.eng: “There is an offense entailing confession for having a nun massage or rub oneself. Where was it laid down?”

pli-tv-pvr2.1:156.6.eng: A number of nuns having a novice nun massage and rub them.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:157.6.pli: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo gihiniyā ummaddāpesuṃ parimaddāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:159.1.eng: “There is an offense entailing confession for asking a question of a monk who has not given permission. Where was it laid down?”

pli-tv-pvr2.1:160.1.eng: “There is an offense entailing confession for entering an inhabited area without wearing one’s chest wrap. Where was it laid down?”

pli-tv-pvr2.1:175.0.eng: 5. The chapter on offenses entailing acknowledgment

pli-tv-pvr2.1:175.4.eng: The nuns from the group of six.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:175.7.eng: There is one rule. There is one addition to the rule.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:178.8.eng: Of the six kinds of originations of offenses, it originates in four ways: …

pli-tv-pvr2.1:179.1.pli: Macchaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:179.1.eng: “There is an offense entailing acknowledgment for asking for fish and then eating it. Where was it laid down?”

pli-tv-pvr2.1:179.4.eng: The nuns from the group of six.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:179.6.pli: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo macchaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:179.6.eng: The nuns from the group of six asking for fish and then eating it.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:179.7.eng: There is one rule. There is one addition to the rule.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:179.8.eng: Of the six kinds of originations of offenses, it originates in four ways: …

pli-tv-pvr2.1:180.1.pli: Maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:180.1.eng: “There is an offense entailing acknowledgment for asking for meat and then eating it. Where was it laid down?”

pli-tv-pvr2.1:180.4.eng: The nuns from the group of six.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:180.6.pli: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo maṃsaṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:180.6.eng: The nuns from the group of six asking for meat and then eating it.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:180.7.eng: There is one rule. There is one addition to the rule.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:180.8.eng: Of the six kinds of originations of offenses, it originates in four ways: …

pli-tv-pvr2.1:181.1.pli: Khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:181.1.eng: “There is an offense entailing acknowledgment for asking for milk and then drinking it. Where was it laid down?”

pli-tv-pvr2.1:181.4.eng: The nuns from the group of six.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:181.6.pli: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo khīraṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:181.6.eng: The nuns from the group of six asking for milk and then drinking it.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:181.7.eng: There is one rule. There is one addition to the rule.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:181.8.eng: Of the six kinds of originations of offenses, it originates in four ways: …

pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.1.pli: Dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.1.eng: “There is an offense entailing acknowledgment for asking for curd and then eating it. Where was it laid down?”

pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.4.eng: The nuns from the group of six.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.6.pli: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.6.eng: The nuns from the group of six asking for curd and then eating it.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.7.eng: There is one rule. There is one addition to the rule.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.8.eng: Of the six kinds of originations of offenses, it originates in four ways:

pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.9.pli: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.9.eng: from body, not from speech or mind; or

pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.10.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.10.eng: from body and speech, not from mind; or

pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.11.pli: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.11.eng: from body and mind, not from speech; or

pli-tv-pvr2.1:182.12.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….

pli-tv-pvr2.1:183.1.eng: The eight offenses entailing acknowledgment are finished.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:186.1.pli: Ye sikkhāpadā bhikkhuvibhaṅge vitthāritā te saṅkhittā bhikkhunivibhaṅge.
pli-tv-pvr2.1:186.1.eng: The training rules given in full in the Monks’ Analysis are contracted in the Nuns’ Analysis.

pli-tv-pvr2.1:186.2.eng: The questions and answers on the nuns’ Pātimokkha rules and their analysis, the first, are finished.
